nav.div: Mayer Unified School District #43 » News » School Closure Update 04-08-2020

p.span: Dear Mayer Unified School District families,

During this difficult time many of our programs and services for families have been compromised. We regret to inform you that the Hungry Kids weekly food backpacks on Thursdays have been temporarily suspended because the Prescott Food Bank is unable to restock our pantry at this time. We will inform you immediately when we can resume this program.

em.span: Please note that this does NOT impact the regular prepackaged breakfast/lunch program which continues to be provided by the school district on Mondays-Thursdays.

p.span: We want to thank all of you as we work through this difficult situation.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
